Title: Telerik UI for Blazor 1.6: Menu, TimePicker & Grid Upgrades
Description: In Telerik UI for Blazor 1.6, we've got new controls as well as major upgrades to the Grid, Preview 8 compatibility and more. Check it out to see what's new.

Title: Using JSON for polymorphic types in C# - Oxford Computer Consultants
Description: Using Blazor, code written for the front-end has access to all the language features of C#. In particular, it may be useful to have a type hierarchy and make use of polymorphism. However, JSON objects have no explicit type, so how can we correctly deserialise a subtype?

Title: How the .NET Team uses Azure Pipelines to produce Docker Images | .NET Blog
Description: Producing Docker images for .NET might not seem like that big of a deal.  Once you’ve got a Dockerfile defined, just run “docker build“ and “docker push“ and you’re done, right?  Then just rinse and repeat when new versions of .NET are released and that should be all that’s needed.

Title: Insomnia
Description: Debug APIs like a human, not a robot

Title: Office
Description: View, edit, and create Office files within the browser, and get spelling, grammar, and style checking as you type on most websites.

Title: Cyber warfare, IoT hacks, and mass data gathering – the new security threats of a hyper-connected world Cyber warfare, IoT hacks, and mass data gathering
Description: With 5G touted as the catalyst of the Internet of Things, what are the implications of increased IoT hacks, industrial cyberattacks, and data gathering?

Title: Performance Matters - The Newsletter For Tech Leaders
Description: Performance Matters brings you the latest software performance news and inspiration, delivered to your inbox every week. Subscribe now!

Title: WebSocketStream - Chrome Platform Status
Description: The WebSocket API provides a JavaScript interface to the RFC6455 WebSocket protocol. While it has served well, it is awkward from an ergonomics perspective and is missing the important feature of backpressure. The intent of the WebSocketStream API is to resolve these deficiencies by integrating streams with the WebSocket API.

Title: Windows Desktop: .NET Standup - August 22nd 2019 - App Center for Desktop apps, XAML Tools & WinUI
Little Rock Tech Fest 2019
Description: Tech Fest will be held on the 10th and 11th of October 2019, returning once again to the Statehouse Convention Center ballrooms. Industry leaders in all things technology will journey from all corners to come together for these 2 days to form Arkansas's premier software development conference. We want you to be a part of the experience.This year's conference will grant you access to 40+ top-notch sessions over two day’s time. We try to play as hard as we work. Your ticket also includes lunch both days of the conference, a pre-event party, an attendee party, an official conference t-shirt, and additional swag!
